column3: spellDescription
Create a small explosion in front of you.
Launch several bubbles at the enemy.
A bolt of lightning zaps the ground in front of you.
Create a boulder and shatter it into pieces.
Create blasts of wind that knock the enemy around.
Turn yourself into a massive boulder to knock your enemies around. 12s cooldown
Create a shield made out of bubbles that damages the enemy. 12s Cooldown
Launch your self into the air leaving a pillar of flame behind. 2s cooldown
Hop back and fire an array of lightning . 8s cooldown
Launch up into the air and launch the enemies around you. 8s cooldown
Summon a boulder and launch it towards the enemy. 2s cooldown
Shoot a bolt of lightning that bounces from one enemy to the other. 2s cooldown
Summons a fireballthat explodes on impact. 1s cooldown
Summons a smal tidal wave that slows down enemies. 2s cooldown
Summons a vortex of wind that knocks enemies around. 2s cooldown
Call several lightning bolts that goes back and forth. 12s cooldown
A beam of concentrated fire that blasts through all enemeis. 12s cooldown
Summon a wave of earth spikes that shoot out from the ground. 12s Cooldown
A vortex of water is summoned sucking nearby enemies in. 12s cooldown
Summon a pillar of wind that traps the enemy into the air. 12s cooldown
